lead_paragraph: Defending champion Novak Djokovic issued a chilling warning to his Australian Open challengers on Tuesday by storming to a 6-3 6-2 6-4 victory over seventh seed Kei Nishikori to set up a blockbuster semi-final against Roger Federer.
snippet: Defending champion Novak Djokovic issued a chilling warning to his Australian Open challengers on Tuesday by storming to a 6-3 6-2 6-4 victory over seventh seed Kei Nishikori to set up a blockbuster semi-final against Roger Federer....

headline.main: Djokovic Eases Past Nishikori to Set Up Federer Showdown
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Eases Past Nishikori to Set Up Federer Showdown
